definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

sentences.english: Russia, a major oil producer, is unlikely to embrace any ambitious emissions reductions.
sentences.chinese: 產油大國俄羅斯不太可能歡迎任何大幅減排計劃。

sentences.english: We will strive to conserve energy and reduce emissions.
sentences.chinese: 打好節能減排攻堅戰和持久戰。

sentences.english: Here will be an important carrier of self-innovation and a model area of saving energy and reducing emission.
sentences.chinese: 這裏將是自主創新的重要載體和節能減排的示範區。

sentences.english: The move will reduce Beijing's pollutant emissions in the heating season by over 10000 tons annually.
sentences.chinese: 此項措施將使北京採暖季可減排污染物上萬噸。

sentences.english: Having fewer children to accomplish emissions reduction, it is really a topic ahead of its time.
sentences.chinese: 從少生孩子入手談減排，這真是一個很超前的話題。

sentences.english: Second, where the abatement occurs must be separated from who pays for it.
sentences.chinese: 其次，減排的發生地應與成本支付方相分離。

sentences.english: Only developed nations, including the US, would be expected to guarantee cuts.
sentences.chinese: 只有發達國家需要保證減排量，當然也包括美國。

sentences.english: Environmentalists may embrace genetically modified crops as a carbon-reduction technology.
sentences.chinese: 轉基因作物將和碳減排技術一樣得到環保主義者接受。

sentences.english: The verification has identified material misstatements in the reported emission reductions.
sentences.chinese: 覈查對報告的減排發現實質性的誤差。

sentences.english: Reducing greenhouse gases (GHGs) is a hot point involved in global environmental issues .
sentences.chinese: 溫室氣體的減排是當前國際社會關心的熱點環境問題。

sentences.english: We will further improve methods for assessing performance in meeting energy conservation and pollution reduction targets.
sentences.chinese: 進一步完善節能減排目標責任考覈辦法。

sentences.english: That would pave the way for Obama to announce the US targets soon after.
sentences.chinese: 這將爲奧巴馬不久後宣佈美國的減排目標鋪平了道路。

sentences.english: Most carbon reduction policies aim to do the job by increments.
sentences.chinese: 大多數碳減排政策着眼於增量。

sentences.english: Third, the performance of energy conservation and emission reduction is outstanding.
sentences.chinese: 三是節能減排成績突出。

sentences.english: The paper presents a theoretical model of intertemporal optimization of GHGs emissions reduction.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一個溫室氣體減排跨期優化的理論模型。

sentences.english: We both want to be energy-saving emission reduction cost control, but also to become a social responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 我們節能減排既要當成本控制，更要當社會責任。

definition: to confer/to consult/to negotiate/to hold a conference
